turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee drink from starbucks please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will assist with that, what store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the one at 1111 south willow st manchester nh

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have that locations menu pulled up, what did you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a black and white mocha

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: not today, that will do it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: allow me to confirm your order

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You would like a grande black and white mocha with whole milk and whipper cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your drink will be ready at 1111 south willow st in manchester nh shortly

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: receipt will be sent to your as a text message
